creationDescription: This custom Chipotle bowl is a sustainable masterpiece. It features grilled chicken, brown rice, black beans, a medley of fresh veggies, and a light drizzle of salsa for a satisfying and flavorful meal.

reasons.title: üåé Low Carbon Footprint
reasons.description: This bowl features ingredients sourced responsibly and locally whenever possible, minimizing transportation and environmental impact. Choose this option for a more sustainable and delicious meal.

appliedCustomizations.reason: Grilled chicken is a lean protein source, providing a good amount of protein without adding extra fat and calories. It's a sustainable protein choice.
Brown rice is a whole grain that's a good source of fiber and complex carbohydrates. It's a healthier alternative to white rice and can help keep you feeling full and satisfied.
Black beans are a great source of fiber and protein, adding a hearty and satisfying texture to this bowl. They're also low in fat and calories.
Removing the cheese cuts down on calories and saturated fat, making this a lighter and healthier option. It also avoids dairy, which has a higher carbon footprint.
Skipping sour cream reduces the sugar and fat content of the meal. It also avoids dairy, which has a higher carbon footprint.
Salsa adds a burst of flavor and freshness to this bowl. It's also low in calories and a good source of vitamins and minerals.
While delicious, guacamole is high in fat and can add significant calories.  It also relies on avocados, which have a higher carbon footprint due to transportation and growing conditions.
Lettuce adds a satisfying crunch and a boost of vitamins and fiber without adding extra calories. It's a great way to make this meal more filling and nutritious.
Tomatoes are a great source of vitamins and antioxidants, adding flavor and nutritional value to this already healthy meal.
Bell peppers add a vibrant color and a burst of vitamins and antioxidants to this already healthy meal. They're also low in calories and a good source of fiber.

creationDescription: This custom Taco Bell Power Menu Bowl is a sustainable masterpiece. It features seasoned ground beef, black beans, a medley of fresh veggies, and a light drizzle of reduced-fat sour cream for a satisfying and flavorful meal.

reasons.title: üåé Low Carbon Footprint
reasons.description: This bowl features simple ingredients, prioritizing locally sourced produce and lean protein options, minimizing transportation and environmental impact. Choose this option for a more sustainable and delicious meal.

appliedCustomizations.reason: The seasoned ground beef adds a savory flavor and a good source of protein to this power bowl. It's a lean protein source that's low in fat and calories.
Black beans are a great source of fiber and protein, adding a hearty and satisfying texture to this bowl. They're also low in fat and calories.

Removing the rice reduces carbohydrates and calories, making this a lower-calorie and more protein-focused meal.  You can still enjoy the satisfying flavors of the other ingredients. It also avoids processed grains, which often have a higher carbon footprint.
Reduced-fat sour cream provides a creamy flavor and texture without adding too much fat and calories. It also provides a source of calcium.
Lettuce adds a refreshing crunch and a boost of vitamins and fiber without adding extra calories.
Tomatoes are a great source of vitamins and antioxidants, adding flavor and nutritional value to this already healthy meal.
Bell peppers add a vibrant color and a burst of vitamins and antioxidants to this already healthy meal. They're also low in calories and a good source of fiber.
